long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Converter is a minimalist Chrome extension that converts colors between RGB and HEX formats effortlessly. The simple, intuitive interface allows you to switch between RGB and HEX conversion with a single checkbox. Just enter the RGB values or HEX code, hit "Convert," and get the result instantly. The app ensures accuracy with input validation and displays error messages directly on the form to guide users. With no unnecessary features, it focuses solely on providing a seamless color conversion experience. Perfect for designers, developers, or anyone needing quick and accurate color conversions.

Key Features:

Convert RGB to HEX and HEX to RGB
Minimalist and user-friendly design
Copy the converted color code with one click
Input validation for accurate conversions
Error messages displayed on the form
No need to include '#' in HEX input
